name: ba-fe
description: bipolar artist fe w/ hugo & scss

scripts.copy:jquery: rm -rf assets/js/jquery/ && mkdir assets/js/jquery && find node_modules/jquery/dist -name 'jquery.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/jquery' ';'
scripts.copy:jquery.easing: rm -rf assets/js/jquery.easing/ && mkdir assets/js/jquery.easing && find node_modules/jquery.easing -name 'jquery.easing.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/jquery.easing' ';'
scripts.copy:imagesloaded: rm -rf assets/js/imagesloaded/ && mkdir assets/js/imagesloaded && find node_modules/imagesloaded -name 'imagesloaded.pkgd.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/imagesloaded/' ';'
scripts.copy:ekko: rm -rf assets/js/ekko-lightbox/ && mkdir assets/js/ekko-lightbox && find node_modules/ekko-lightbox/dist -name 'ekko-lightbox.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/ekko-lightbox' ';'
scripts.copy:css.slotmachine: rm -rf assets/css/jquery-slotmachine/ && mkdir assets/css/jquery-slotmachine && find node_modules/jquery-slotmachine/dist -name 'jquery.slotmachine.min.css' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/css/jquery-slotmachine' ';'
scripts.copy:slotmachine: rm -rf assets/js/jquery-slotmachine/ && mkdir assets/js/jquery-slotmachine && find node_modules/jquery-slotmachine/dist -name 'slotmachine.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/jquery-slotmachine' ';'
scripts.copy:flickity: rm -rf assets/js/flickity/ && mkdir assets/js/flickity && find node_modules/flickity/dist -name 'flickity.pkgd.min.js' -exec cp -prv '{}' 'assets/js/flickity' ';'
scripts.copy:allscripts: npm run copy:jquery && npm run copy:jquery.easing && npm run copy:imagesloaded && npm run copy:ekko && npm run copy:slotmachine && npm run copy:css.slotmachine && npm run copy:jquery-slotmachine && npm run copy:flickity
scripts.documentation-mode: npm run copy:allscripts && npm run build:css && DOCUMENTATION_MODE=true hugo server -D

author: theninexl
